New Records: 7 runs given away by Bumrah in his four overs today - the second-fewest conceded by an Indian in a men's T20I
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav helped India post a par-plus total of 181 for 7
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs in 4 overs
Kuldeep Yadav picked up 2 wickets for 31 runs
Arshdeep Singh almost picked up a hat-trick
Rashid Khan took his first wicket against India in T20Is by dismissing Rishabh Pant
Virat Kohli hit his first six of the World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma mentioned the pitch would get slower as the game goes on
Bridgetown has a significant bias for teams batting first in men's T20Is
Rashid Khan emphasized doing the right thing at the right time despite the disadvantage of chasing
Post-Match Reflections: India's batters did well to upset the rhythm of the game
India's bowlers benefited from how no one apart from Rahmanullah Gurbaz really came at them
Rohit Sharma used the opportunity to give overs to Jadeja and get him game ready
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was tough to bat on, slow and offering purchase to everyone willing to roll their fingers across the ball
India's no-more-safety-first batting approach brings value
India's riches in bowling are the envy of the world
Afghanistan assessed the conditions well and made early breakthroughs
